data.title: Philippine Church History Reviewer
data.meta_description: PHILIPPINE-CHURCH-HISTORY-REVIEWER (1) - Free download as Word Doc (.doc / .docx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document discusses the history of Christianity in the Philippines. It began when Spain emerged as a powerful nation following the union of Castile and Aragon through marriage. Spain then used its influence to spread Catholicism through colonization. Christopher Columbus' voyage to the Americas opened the door for Spanish colonial expansion and propagation of faith in new territories. The Patronato Real de las Indias system gave Spanish monarchs control over Church appointments and revenues in colonies, establishing royal power over the colonial Catholic Church.
